sentences.en: A line of US tanks slowly advanced.
sentences.cn: 一列美军坦克缓缓前进。

sentences.en: a major advance
sentences.cn: 一项重大进展

sentences.en: Accommodation is never fixed up in advance.
sentences.cn: 住宿从未提前安排好。

sentences.en: Additional beauty treatments can be booked in advance.
sentences.cn: 额外的美容服务可以提前预订。

sentences.en: Advance and give the password.
sentences.cn: 上前说出口令。

sentences.en: Clients normally pay fees in advance, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
sentences.cn: 客户通常按月、季度或年度预付费用。

sentences.en: Could you distribute copies well in advance of the meeting?
sentences.cn: 开会前把复印件早早分发下去，好吗？

sentences.en: Football games often sell out well in advance.
sentences.cn: 足球比赛经常在开赛前很久票就已经售光了。

sentences.en: Generally, warm colours advance in painting and cold colours recede.
sentences.cn: 通常，绘画中暖色调为近感色，而冷色调为远感色。

sentences.en: I had asked everyone to submit questions in advance of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我已请每个人在会议之前提交问题。

sentences.en: I should warn you in advance that I’m not a very good dancer.
sentences.cn: 我要先提醒你，我跳舞不是很好。

sentences.en: In an exercise designed to be as real as possible, they simulated an advance on enemy positions.
sentences.cn: 在一次设计得尽可能逼真的演习中，他们模拟了一次向敌方阵地的前进。

sentences.en: It is a good idea to place your order well in advance.
sentences.cn: 早早就提前下单是个好主意。

sentences.en: Many thanks, in advance, for your help.
sentences.cn: 对你的帮助预先表示万分感谢。

sentences.en: Much advance publicity was given to the talks.
sentences.cn: 对于这次会谈有很多前期报道。

sentences.en: Our understanding of human genetics has advanced considerably.
sentences.cn: 我们对人类遗传学的了解有了很大进展。

sentences.en: She was paid a $100,000 advance for her next two novels.
sentences.cn: 她得到了其接下来的两本小说的10万美元的预付款。

sentences.en: She was paid a £100,000 advance for her next two novels.
sentences.cn: 她接下来的两部小说得到了10万英镑的预付稿费。

sentences.en: the advances made in the understanding of mental handicap
sentences.cn: 在了解智障方面取得的进步

sentences.en: The meeting has been advanced to ten o'clock.
sentences.cn: 会议提前到10点钟。

sentences.en: The salad improves if made in advance and left to stand.
sentences.cn: 色拉如果能事先做好再搁置一会儿，味道会更好。

sentences.en: The subject of the talk is announced a week in advance.
sentences.cn: 会谈的主题已提前一周宣布。

sentences.en: Their aircraft were in advance of those used by the US.
sentences.cn: 他们的飞机比美国人用的要先进。

sentences.en: Their progress at work was mirrored by their children's educational advance.
sentences.cn: 子女在学业上有所进步，他们在工作上也就会有所起色。

sentences.en: They don't normally give any advance notice about which building they're going to inspect.
sentences.cn: 他们对要视察哪座大楼通常不作事先通知。

sentences.en: This research has done much to advance our understanding of language learning.
sentences.cn: 这项研究大大提高了我们对语言学习的认识。

sentences.en: Too much protein in the diet may advance the ageing process.
sentences.cn: 饮食中摄入过量蛋白质可能会加速衰老。

sentences.en: We received no advance warning of the storm.
sentences.cn: 我们没有收到风暴预警。

sentences.en: When planting seedlings I prefer to mark out the rows in advance.
sentences.cn: 种树苗的时候，我喜欢事先划出行来。

words.tran_cn: 先进的；高级的；晚期的；年老的
前进者；相位超前补偿器，进相机
前进；增加；上涨（advance的过去式和过去分词形式）
发展；前进；增长；[会计]预付款

phrases.tran_cn: 军队前卫，先头部队；先锋派
与时俱进；与时代发展同步伐
随着…的增加；随着(时间)的推移

trans.tran_en: Advance booking, notice, or warning is done or given before an event happens

trans.tran_cn: 前进，进步，进展，预付款，追求，（价格等）上涨，提高
trans.tran_en: a change, discovery, or  invention  that brings progress

trans.tran_cn: （为了进攻、威胁等）前进，（知识、技术等）发展，进步，预支，提前，促进，推动，提出（理论等），（价格等）上涨
trans.tran_en: to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers
before something happens or is expected to happen
to be more developed or modern than someone or something else

trans.tran_cn: 提高；前进；取得进展；上涨，增加
trans.tran_en: to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

trans.tran_cn: 预先发放，预先垫付；提前，使提前发生；提出
trans.tran_en: to give someone money before they have earned it
